name: Soho Brands, Inc.
description: Soho Brands, Inc. is a dynamic retail and lifestyle company known for its innovative approach to fashion and accessories. Founded in 2015, Soho Brands operates a diverse portfolio of brands that cater to a wide range of consumers, focusing on quality, sustainability, and cutting-edge design. The company has positioned itself at the intersection of style and functionality, offering products that resonate with the modern lifestyle. With a strong emphasis on e-commerce, Soho Brands leverages advanced technology to enhance customer experience, providing a seamless shopping journey across all platforms. The company’s flagship brand, Soho Chic, is celebrated for its trendy apparel and accessories, while its other lines, including Soho Sport and Soho Home, expand its reach into lifestyle products. Soho Brands is committed to sustainability, sourcing materials responsibly and implementing eco-friendly practices throughout its supply chain. As the company continues to grow, it remains dedicated to fostering a community of style-conscious consumers who value both aesthetics and ethics in their purchasing decisions.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Soho Brands, Inc. | Fashion and Lifestyle Retailer
seo.meta_description: Explore Soho Brands, Inc., a leader in fashion and lifestyle products. Discover our commitment to style, quality, and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Soho Brands specialize in?
faq.answer: Soho Brands specializes in fashion apparel, accessories, and home goods.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Soho Brands?
faq.answer: Jessica Tran is the CEO of Soho Brands, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Soho Brands headquartered?
faq.answer: Soho Brands is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: What brands does Soho Brands own?
faq.answer: Soho Brands owns several brands including Soho Chic, Soho Sport, and Soho Home.
